Experience in Nonprofits, Museums, and Cultural Institutions

The Aspen Institute

National Endowment for the Humanities

Preservation and Access Intern
May 2019–August 2019
  • Independently created a database of cultural heritage experts in Native American studies to increase Native American representation in grant panels
  • Conducted analysis on completed grant programs and past applications to assess Native American outreach efforts and make recommendations
